fields_of_interest: General and Institutional Affairs, Economy, finance and the euro, Consumers, International co-operation and development, Education and training, Energy, Environment, Youth, Single market, Maritime affairs and fisheries, Regional Policy, Trans-European Networks, Public Health, Climate Action, Communication
eu_initiatives:
We are currently following the proposal for amending the Directive 2008/ 98/ EC, EU Action Plan for Circular Economy and it's development and legislative procedure.  
 
We are also following the development of the EU Plastic Strategy.
organisation_name: Clean Europe Network - European Litter Prevention Association ASBL (ELPA)
subsection: Non-governmental organisations, platforms and networks and similar
goals__remit: The Clean Europe Network is a pan-European platform where organisations active in the field of litter prevention share experience, expertise, best practice and research with a view to improving litter prevention across the EU. It aims to develop common programmes/ methodologies in areas where there is an added value in an European approach.
